import React from 'react'; import './footer.css'; // Assuming you store the CSS in Footer.css import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome'; // Import FontAwesome import { faMedium, faTwitter, faLinkedin } from '@fortawesome/free-brands-svg-icons'; import { faEnvelope, faNewspaper } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons'; // For non-branded icons const Footer = () => { return (
X LinkedIn Email
Accessibility statement Privacy policy
); } export default Footer;
